name: cashcraft_full
description: ## Setup (local) 1. Install Node & MongoDB. 2. Copy `backend/.env.sample` to `backend/.env` and update the values. 3. From `cashcraft/backend` run:    - `npm install`    - `npm run dev` (or `npm start`) 4. Serve frontend by opening `cashcraft/frontend/public/index.html` in browser or configure express to serve static files.
